DOC.detailed_description: Combination ddI/ribavirin therapy , safe effective , offer alternative combination antiretroviral regimen patient unable tolerate regimen contain zidovudine ( AZT ) . Patients receive ddI alone 4 week , follow 8 week combination ddI/ribavirin . Patients complete first 12 week without major toxicity may receive additional 12 week combination therapy optional basis . Patients follow 60 day last treatment visit .
